A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated: 16/06/2010 
 
 
AVSEC ORDER NO. 05 /2010 
 
 
 
Subject:   Security of Cargo Complex at airports in the country. 
 
 
 
In continuation to BCAS AVSEC Order No.01/2010 dated 19/01/2010 on the 
subject it has been decided that all airport operators should  create a Sterile Hold Area 
in the Cargo Complex at airports by erecting concrete walls or wire mesh. This should 
be materialized within fifteen days from the date of issue of this order.  
 
2. 
This order is issued in exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of Aircraft Act 
1934 delegated vide Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation Notification No. 
1797 dated July 3, 1997 for the purpose of securing the safety of aircraft operation, 
violation of which shall attract legal action under Sec. 11A of Aircraft Act 1934. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 ( Rohit Nandan )
